verses.arabic: اللَّـهُ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ ۚ لَا تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلَا نَوْمٌ ۚ لَّهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۗ مَن ذَا الَّذِي يَشْفَعُ عِندَهُ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِ ۚ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ ۖ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيْءٍ مِّنْ عِلْمِهِ إِلَّا بِمَا شَاءَ ۚ وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ ۖ وَلَا يَئُودُهُ حِفْظُهُمَا ۚ وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيمُ
verses.translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence. Neither drowsiness overtakes Him nor sleep. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is it that can intercede with Him except by His permission? He knows what is before them and what will be after them, and they encompass not a thing of His knowledge except for what He wills. His Kursi extends over the heavens and the earth, and their preservation tires Him not. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.
verses.transliteration: Allahu la ilaha illa huwa al-hayyu al-qayyum, la ta'khudhuhu sinatun wa la nawm, lahu ma fi as-samawati wa ma fi al-ard, man dha alladhi yashfa'u 'indahu illa bi-idhnih, ya'lamu ma bayna aydihim wa ma khalfahum, wa la yuhituna bi shay'in min 'ilmihi illa bima sha', wasi'a kursiyyuhu as-samawati wa al-ard, wa la ya'uduhu hifzhuhuma, wa huwa al-'aliyyu al-'azhim

verses.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّـهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.
verses.transliteration: Bismillahi ar-rahmani ar-raheem

verses.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّـهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
verses.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahi rabbi al-'alameen

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيهِ ۛ هُدًى لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.translation: This is the Book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allah.
verses.transliteration: Dhalika al-kitabu la rayba fih, hudan lil-muttaqeen

verses.arabic: الَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَاةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
verses.translation: Who believe in the unseen, establish prayer, and spend out of what We have provided for them.
verses.transliteration: Alladheena yu'minoona bil-ghaybi wa yuqeemoona as-salata wa mimma razaqnahum yunfiqoon

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَالَّذِينَ هَادُوا وَالنَّصَارَىٰ وَالصَّابِئِينَ مَنْ آمَنَ بِاللَّـهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ وَعَمِلَ صَالِحًا فَلَهُمْ أَجْرُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ وَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, those who believed and those who were Jews or Christians or Sabeans - those who believed in Allah and the Last Day and did righteousness - will have their reward with their Lord, and no fear will there be concerning them, nor will they grieve.
verses.transliteration: Inna alladheena amanoo walladheena hadoo wan-nasara was-sabi'eena man amana billahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri wa 'amila salihan fa-lahum ajruhum 'inda rabbihim wa la khawfun 'alayhim wa la hum yahzanoon

verses.arabic: لَّيْسَ الْبِرَّ أَن تُوَلُّوا وُجُوهَكُمْ قِبَلَ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ الْبِرَّ مَنْ آمَنَ بِاللَّـهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ وَالْمَلَائِكَةِ وَالْكِتَابِ وَالنَّبِيِّينَ وَآتَى الْمَالَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ ذَوِي الْقُرْبَىٰ وَالْيَتَامَىٰ وَالْمَسَاكِينَ وَابْنَ السَّبِيلِ وَالسَّائِلِينَ وَفِي الرِّقَابِ وَأَقَامَ الصَّلَاةَ وَآتَى الزَّكَاةَ وَالْمُوفُونَ بِعَهْدِهِمْ إِذَا عَاهَدُوا ۖ وَالصَّابِرِينَ فِي الْبَأْسَاءِ وَالضَّرَّاءِ وَحِينَ الْبَأْسِ ۗ أُولَـٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ صَدَقُوا ۖ وَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: Righteousness is not that you turn your faces toward the east or the west, but righteousness is in one who believes in Allah, the Last Day, the angels, the Book, and the prophets and gives wealth, in spite of love for it, to relatives, orphans, the needy, the traveler, those who ask, and for freeing slaves; and who establishes prayer and gives zakah; those who fulfill their promise when they promise; and those who are patient in poverty and hardship and during battle. Those are the ones who have been true, and it is those who are the righteous.
verses.transliteration: Laysa al-birra an tuwalloo wujoohakum qibala al-mashriqi wal-maghribi wa lakinna al-birra man amana billahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri wal-mala'ikati wal-kitabi wan-nabiyyeena wa ata al-mala 'ala hubbihi dhawi al-qurba wal-yatama wal-masakeena wabna as-sabeeli was-sa'ileena wa fi ar-riqabi wa aqama as-salata wa ata az-zakata wal-mufoona bi-'ahdihim idha 'ahadoo was-sabireena fi al-ba'sa'i wad-darra'i wa heena al-ba's, ula'ika alladheena sadaqoo wa ula'ika humu al-muttaqoon

verses.arabic: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّـهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا ۚ لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتْ وَعَلَيْهَا مَا اكْتَسَبَتْ ۗ رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذْنَا إِن نَّسِينَا أَوْ أَخْطَأْنَا ۚ رَبَّنَا وَلَا تَحْمِلْ عَلَيْنَا إِصْرًا كَمَا حَمَلْتَهُ عَلَى الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِنَا ۚ رَبَّنَا وَلَا تُحَمِّلْنَا مَا لَا طَاقَةَ لَنَا بِهِ ۖ وَاعْفُ عَنَّا وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا وَارْحَمْنَا ۚ أَنتَ مَوْلَانَا فَانصُرْنَا عَلَى الْقَوْمِ الْكَافِرِينَ
verses.translation: Allah does not charge a soul except with that within its capacity. It will have what it has gained, and it will bear what it has earned. Our Lord, do not impose blame upon us if we have forgotten or erred. Our Lord, and lay not upon us a burden like that which You laid upon those before us. Our Lord, and burden us not with that which we have no ability to bear. And pardon us; and forgive us; and have mercy upon us. You are our protector, so give us victory over the disbelieving people.
verses.transliteration: La yukallifu Allahu nafsan illa wus'aha, laha ma kasabat wa 'alayha ma iktasabat. Rabbana la tu'akhidhna in naseena aw akhta'na, rabbana wa la tahmil 'alayna isran kama hamaltahu 'ala alladheena min qablina, rabbana wa la tuhammilna ma la taqata lana bih, wa'fu 'anna waghfir lana warhamna, anta mawlana fansurna 'ala al-qawmi al-kafireena

verses.arabic: زُيِّنَ لِلنَّاسِ حُبُّ الشَّهَوَاتِ مِنَ النِّسَاءِ وَالْبَنِينَ وَالْقَنَاطِيرِ الْمُقَنطَرَةِ مِنَ الذَّهَبِ وَالْفِضَّةِ وَالْخَيْلِ الْمُسَوَّمَةِ وَالْأَنْعَامِ وَالْحَرْثِ ۗ ذَٰلِكَ مَتَاعُ الْحَيَاةِ الدُّنْيَا ۖ وَاللَّـهُ عِندَهُ حُسْنُ الْمَآبِ
verses.translation: Beautified for people is the love of that which they desire - of women and sons, heaped-up sums of gold and silver, fine branded horses, and cattle and tilled land. That is the enjoyment of worldly life, but Allah has with Him the best return.
verses.transliteration: Zuyyina lin-nasi hubbu ash-shahawati mina an-nisa'i wal-baneena wal-qanateeri al-muqantarati mina adh-dhahabi wal-fid-dati wal-khayli al-musawwamati wal-an'ami wal-harth, dhalika mata'u al-hayati ad-dunya, wallahu 'indahu husnu al-ma'ab

verses.arabic: قُلِ اللَّـهُمَّ مَالِكَ الْمُلْكِ تُؤْتِي الْمُلْكَ مَن تَشَاءُ وَتَنزِعُ الْمُلْكَ مِمَّن تَشَاءُ وَتُعِزُّ مَن تَشَاءُ وَتُذِلُّ مَن تَشَاءُ ۖ بِيَدِكَ الْخَيْرُ ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.translation: Say, O Allah, Owner of Sovereignty, You give sovereignty to whom You will and You take sovereignty away from whom You will. You honor whom You will and You humble whom You will. In Your hand is all good. Indeed, You are over all things competent.
verses.transliteration: Quli allahumma malika al-mulki tu'ti al-mulka man tasha'u wa tanzi'u al-mulka mimman tasha'u wa tu'izzu man tasha'u wa tudhillu man tasha'u, bi-yadika al-khayr, innaka 'ala kulli shay'in qadeer

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ اتَّقُوا رَبَّكُمُ الَّذِي خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍ وَاحِدَةٍ وَخَلَقَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا وَبَثَّ مِنْهُمَا رِجَالًا كَثِيرًا وَنِسَاءً ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّـهَ الَّذِي تَسَاءَلُونَ بِهِ وَالْأَرْحَامَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّـهَ كَانَ عَلَيْكُمْ رَقِيبًا
verses.translation: O mankind, fear your Lord, who created you from one soul and created from it its mate and dispersed from both of them many men and women. And fear Allah, through whom you ask one another, and the wombs. Indeed Allah is ever, over you, an Observer.
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha an-nasu attaqoo rabbakumu alladhee khalaqakum min nafsin wahidatin wa khalaqa minha zawjaha wa baththa minhuma rijalan katheeran wa nisa'an, wattaqoo Allaha alladhee tasa'aloona bihi wal-arham, inna Allaha kana 'alaykum raqeeba

verses.arabic: مِنْ أَجْلِ ذَٰلِكَ كَتَبْنَا عَلَىٰ بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ أَنَّهُ مَن قَتَلَ نَفْسًا بِغَيْرِ نَفْسٍ أَوْ فَسَادٍ فِي الْأَرْضِ فَكَأَنَّمَا قَتَلَ النَّاسَ جَمِيعًا وَمَنْ أَحْيَاهَا فَكَأَنَّمَا أَحْيَا النَّاسَ جَمِيعًا ۚ وَلَقَدْ جَاءَتْهُمْ رُسُلُنَا بِالْبَيِّنَاتِ ثُمَّ إِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِّنْهُم بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ فِي الْأَرْضِ لَمُسْرِفُونَ
verses.translation: Because of that, We decreed upon the Children of Israel that whoever kills a soul unless for a soul or for corruption in the land - it is as if he had slain mankind entirely. And whoever saves one - it is as if he had saved mankind entirely. And our messengers had certainly come to them with clear proofs. Then indeed many of them, even after that, throughout the land, were transgressors.
verses.transliteration: Min ajli dhalika katabna 'ala banee isra'eela annahu man qatala nafsan bi-ghayri nafsin aw fasadin fi al-ardi fa-ka'annama qatala an-nasa jamee'an wa man ahyaha fa-ka'annama ahya an-nasa jamee'an, wa laqad ja'at-hum rusuluna bil-bayyinati thumma inna katheeran minhum ba'da dhalika fi al-ardi la-musrifoon

verses.arabic: وَعِندَهُ مَفَاتِحُ الْغَيْبِ لَا يَعْلَمُهَا إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا فِي الْبَرِّ وَالْبَحْرِ ۚ وَمَا تَسْقُطُ مِن وَرَقَةٍ إِلَّا يَعْلَمُهَا وَلَا حَبَّةٍ فِي ظُلُمَاتِ الْأَرْضِ وَلَا رَطْبٍ وَلَا يَابِسٍ إِلَّا فِي كِتَابٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: And with Him are the keys of the unseen; none knows them except Him. And He knows what is on the land and in the sea. Not a leaf falls but that He knows it. And no grain is there within the darknesses of the earth and no moist or dry thing but that it is in a clear record.
verses.transliteration: Wa 'indahu mafatihu al-ghaybi la ya'lamuha illa huwa, wa ya'lamu ma fi al-barri wal-bahri, wa ma tasqutu min waraqatin illa ya'lamuha wa la habbatin fi zulumati al-ardi wa la ratbin wa la yabisin illa fi kitabin mubeen

verses.arabic: وَلَا تُفْسِدُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ بَعْدَ إِصْلَاحِهَا وَادْعُوهُ خَوْفًا وَطَمَعًا ۚ إِنَّ رَحْمَتَ اللَّـهِ قَرِيبٌ مِّنَ الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: And cause no corruption upon the earth after its reformation. And invoke Him in fear and aspiration. Indeed, the mercy of Allah is near to the doers of good.
verses.transliteration: Wa la tufsidoo fi al-ardi ba'da islahiha wad'oohu khawfan wa tama'an, inna rahmata Allahi qareebun mina al-muhsineen

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِن تَتَّقُوا اللَّـهَ يَجْعَل لَّكُمْ فُرْقَانًا وَيُكَفِّرْ عَنكُمْ سَيِّئَاتِكُمْ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ۗ وَاللَّـهُ ذُو الْفَضْلِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: O you who have believed, if you fear Allah, He will grant you a criterion and will remove from you your misdeeds and forgive you. And Allah is the possessor of great bounty.
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alladheena amanoo in tattaqoo Allaha yaj'al lakum furqanan wa yukaffir 'ankum sayyi'atikum wa yaghfir lakum, wallahu dhoo al-fadli al-'azeem

verses.arabic: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّـهُ لَنَا هُوَ مَوْلَانَا ۚ وَعَلَى اللَّـهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ الْمُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Say, 'Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us; He is our protector.' And upon Allah let the believers rely.
verses.transliteration: Qul lan yuseebana illa ma kataba Allahu lana huwa mawlana, wa 'ala Allahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minoon

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ قَدْ جَاءَتْكُم مَّوْعِظَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَشِفَاءٌ لِّمَا فِي الصُّدُورِ وَهُدًى وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: O mankind, there has to come to you instruction from your Lord and healing for what is in the breasts and guidance and mercy for the believers.
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha an-nasu qad ja'atkum maw'izatun min rabbikum wa shifa'un lima fi as-sudoori wa hudan wa rahmatun lil-mu'mineen

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِنْ أُرِيدُ إِلَّا الْإِصْلَاحَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ ۚ وَمَا تَوْفِيقِي إِلَّا بِاللَّـهِ ۚ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَإِلَيْهِ أُنِيبُ
verses.translation: He said, 'I only intend reform as much as I am able. And my success is not but through Allah. Upon him I have relied, and to Him I return.'
verses.transliteration: Qala in ureed illa al-islaha ma istata't, wa ma tawfeeqee illa billah, 'alayhi tawakkaltu wa ilayhi uneeb

verses.arabic: يَا بَنِيَّ اذْهَبُوا فَتَحَسَّسُوا مِن يُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ وَلَا تَيْأَسُوا مِن رَّوْحِ اللَّـهِ ۖ إِنَّهُ لَا يَيْأَسُ مِن رَّوْحِ اللَّـهِ إِلَّا الْقَوْمُ الْكَافِرُونَ
verses.translation: O my sons, go and find out about Joseph and his brother and despair not of relief from Allah. Indeed, no one despairs of relief from Allah except the disbelieving people.
verses.transliteration: Ya baniyya idhhaboo fa-tahassasoo min Yusufa wa akheehi wa la tay'asoo min rawhi Allah, innahu la yay'asu min rawhi Allahi illa al-qawmu al-kafiroon

verses.arabic: لَهُ مُعَقِّبَاتٌ مِّن بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِ يَحْفَظُونَهُ مِنْ أَمْرِ اللَّـهِ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّـهَ لَا يُغَيِّرُ مَا بِقَوْمٍ حَتَّىٰ يُغَيِّرُوا مَا بِأَنفُسِهِمْ ۗ وَإِذَا أَرَادَ اللَّـهُ بِقَوْمٍ سُوءًا فَلَا مَرَدَّ لَهُ ۚ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن دُونِهِ مِن وَالٍ
verses.translation: For each one are successive angels before and behind him who protect him by the decree of Allah. Indeed, Allah will not change the condition of a people until they change what is in themselves. And when Allah intends for a people ill, there is no repelling it. And there is not for them besides Him any patron.
verses.transliteration: Lahu mu'aqqibatun min bayni yadayhi wa min khalfihi yahfazoonahu min amri Allah, inna Allaha la yughayyiru ma bi-qawmin hatta yughayyiroo ma bi-anfusihim, wa idha arada Allahu bi-qawmin soo'an fa-la maradda lahu, wa ma lahum min doonihi min waal

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ تَأَذَّنَ رَبُّكُمْ لَئِن شَكَرْتُمْ لَأَزِيدَنَّكُمْ ۖ وَلَئِن كَفَرْتُمْ إِنَّ عَذَابِي لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: And when your Lord proclaimed, 'If you are grateful, I will certainly give you more. But if you are ungrateful, indeed, My punishment is severe.'
verses.transliteration: Wa idh ta'adhdhana rabbukum la'in shakartum la-azeedannakum, wa la'in kafartum inna 'adhabee la-shadeed

verses.arabic: وَاعْبُدْ رَبَّكَ حَتَّىٰ يَأْتِيَكَ الْيَقِينُ
verses.translation: And worship your Lord until there comes to you the certainty (death).
verses.transliteration: Wa'bud rabbaka hatta ya'tiyaka al-yaqeen

verses.arabic: إِنَّ اللَّـهَ يَأْمُرُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَالْإِحْسَانِ وَإِيتَاءِ ذِي الْقُرْبَىٰ وَيَنْهَىٰ عَنِ الْفَحْشَاءِ وَالْمُنكَرِ وَالْبَغْيِ ۚ يَعِظُكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, Allah orders justice and good conduct and giving to relatives and forbids immorality and bad conduct and oppression. He admonishes you that perhaps you will be reminded.
verses.transliteration: Inna Allaha ya'muru bil-'adli wal-ihsani wa eetai dhee al-qurba wa yanha 'ani al-fahsha'i wal-munkari wal-baghyi, ya'izukum la'allakum tadhakkaroon

verses.arabic: مَّنِ اهْتَدَىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَهْتَدِي لِنَفْسِهِ ۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَإِنَّمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيْهَا ۚ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۗ وَمَا كُنَّا مُعَذِّبِينَ حَتَّىٰ نَبْعَثَ رَسُولًا
verses.translation: Whoever is guided is only guided for the benefit of his soul. And whoever errs only errs against it. And no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. And never would We punish until We sent a messenger.
verses.transliteration: Man ihtada fa-innama yahtadee li-nafsihi, wa man dalla fa-innama yadillu 'alayha, wa la taziru waziratun wizra ukhra, wa ma kunna mu'adhdhibeena hatta nab'atha rasoola

verses.arabic: الْمَالُ وَالْبَنُونَ زِينَةُ الْحَيَاةِ الدُّنْيَا ۖ وَالْبَاقِيَاتُ الصَّالِحَاتُ خَيْرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَثَوَابًا وَخَيْرٌ أَمَلًا
verses.translation: Wealth and children are the adornment of worldly life. But the enduring good deeds are better to your Lord for reward and better for hope.
verses.transliteration: Al-malu wal-banoona zeenatu al-hayati ad-dunya, wal-baqiyatu as-salihatu khayrun 'inda rabbika thawaban wa khayrun amala

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ سَيَجْعَلُ لَهُمُ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ وُدًّا
verses.translation: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - the Most Merciful will appoint for them affection.
verses.transliteration: Inna alladheena amanoo wa 'amilu as-salihati sa-yaj'alu lahumu ar-rahmanu wudda

verses.arabic: إِنَّنِي أَنَا اللَّـهُ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا أَنَا فَاعْبُدْنِي وَأَقِمِ الصَّلَاةَ لِذِكْرِي
verses.translation: Indeed, I am Allah. There is no deity except Me, so worship Me and establish prayer for My remembrance.
verses.transliteration: Innanee ana Allahu la ilaha illa ana fa'budnee wa aqimi as-salata li-dhikree

verses.arabic: وَمَا أَرْسَلْنَاكَ إِلَّا رَحْمَةً لِّلْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: And We sent you not, except as a mercy to the worlds.
verses.transliteration: Wa ma arsalnaka illa rahmatan lil-'alameen

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا ارْكَعُوا وَاسْجُدُوا وَاعْبُدُوا رَبَّكُمْ وَافْعَلُوا الْخَيْرَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
verses.translation: O you who have believed, bow and prostrate and worship your Lord and do good - that you may succeed.
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alladheena amanoo arka'oo wasjudoo wa'budoo rabbakum waf'aloo al-khayra la'allakum tuflihoon

verses.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ اغْفِرْ وَارْحَمْ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ الرَّاحِمِينَ
verses.translation: And, say: My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful.
verses.transliteration: Wa qul rabbi aghfir warham wa anta khayru ar-rahimeen

verses.arabic: اللَّـهُ نُورُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ مَثَلُ نُورِهِ كَمِشْكَاةٍ فِيهَا مِصْبَاحٌ ۖ الْمِصْبَاحُ فِي زُجَاجَةٍ ۖ الزُّجَاجَةُ كَأَنَّهَا كَوْكَبٌ دُرِّيٌّ يُوقَدُ مِن شَجَرَةٍ مُّبَارَكَةٍ زَيْتُونَةٍ لَّا شَرْقِيَّةٍ وَلَا غَرْبِيَّةٍ يَكَادُ زَيْتُهَا يُضِيءُ وَلَوْ لَمْ تَمْسَسْهُ نَارٌ ۚ نُّورٌ عَلَىٰ نُورٍ ۗ يَهْدِي اللَّـهُ لِنُورِهِ مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ وَيَضْرِبُ اللَّـهُ الْأَمْثَالَ لِلنَّاسِ ۗ وَاللَّـهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Allah is the light of the heavens and the earth. The example of His light is like a niche within which is a lamp, the lamp is within glass, the glass as if it were a brilliantly shining star lit from the oil of a blessed olive tree, neither of the east nor of the west, whose oil would almost glow even if untouched by fire. Light upon light. Allah guides to His light whom He wills. And Allah presents examples for the people, and Allah is Knowing of all things.
verses.transliteration: Allahu nooru as-samawaati wal-ard, mathalu noorihi ka-mishkatin feeha misbah, al-misbaahu fee zujaajah, az-zujaajatu ka'annaha kawkabun durriyyun yooqadu min shajaratin mubarakahin zaytoonatin la sharqiyyatin wa la gharbiyyatin yakaadu zaytuhaa yudee'u wa law lam tamsashu naar, noorun 'ala noor, yahdee Allahu li-noorihi man yashaa', wa yadribu Allahu al-amthala lin-naas, wa Allahu bikulli shay'in 'aleem

verses.arabic: وَالَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَاجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
verses.translation: And those who say, 'Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous.'
verses.transliteration: Walladheena yaqooloona rabbana hab lana min azwaajina wa dhurriyyaatina qurrata a'yunin waj'alna lilmuttaqeena imaama

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَنْ أَتَى اللَّـهَ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: Except one who comes to Allah with a sound heart.
verses.transliteration: Illa man ata Allaha bi-qalbin saleem

verses.arabic: أَمَّن يُجِيبُ الْمُضْطَرَّ إِذَا دَعَاهُ وَيَكْشِفُ السُّوءَ وَيَجْعَلُكُمْ خُلَفَاءَ الْأَرْضِ ۗ أَإِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ اللَّـهِ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: Is He not best who responds to the desperate one when he calls upon Him and removes evil and makes you inheritors of the earth? Is there a deity with Allah? Little do you remember.
verses.transliteration: Amman yujibu al-mudtarra idha da'aahu wa yakshifu as-soo'a wa yaj'alukum khulafaa'a al-ard, a-ilaahun ma'a Allah, qaleelan ma tadhakkaroon

verses.arabic: وَابْتَغِ فِيمَا آتَاكَ اللَّـهُ الدَّارَ الْآخِرَةَ ۖ وَلَا تَنسَ نَصِيبَكَ مِنَ الدُّنْيَا ۖ وَأَحْسِن كَمَا أَحْسَنَ اللَّـهُ إِلَيْكَ ۖ وَلَا تَبْغِ الْفَسَادَ فِي الْأَرْضِ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّـهَ لَا يُحِبُّ الْمُفْسِدِينَ
verses.translation: But seek, through that which Allah has given you, the home of the Hereafter; but do not forget your share of the world. And do good as Allah has done good to you. And desire not corruption in the land. Indeed, Allah does not like corrupters.
verses.transliteration: Wabtaghi feema ataaka Allahu ad-daara al-aakhirata wa la tansa naseebaka mina ad-dunya wa ahsin kama ahsana Allahu ilayka wa la tabghi al-fasaada fi al-ard, inna Allaha la yuhibbu al-mufsideen

verses.arabic: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا ۚ وَإِنَّ اللَّـهَ لَمَعَ الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways. And indeed, Allah is with the doers of good.
verses.transliteration: Walladheena jaahadoo feena la-nahdiyannahum subulana, wa inna Allaha lama'a al-muhsineen

verses.arabic: وَمِنْ آيَاتِهِ أَنْ خَلَقَ لَكُم مِّنْ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا لِّتَسْكُنُوا إِلَيْهَا وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَكُم مَّوَدَّةً وَرَحْمَةً ۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَاتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: And of His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquillity in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.
verses.transliteration: Wa min aayaatihi an khalaqa lakum min anfusikum azwaajan li-taskunoo ilayha wa ja'ala baynakum mawaddatan wa rahmah, inna fee dhaalika la-aayaatin li-qawmin yatafakkaroon

verses.arabic: وَوَصَّيْنَا الْإِنسَانَ بِوَالِدَيْهِ حَمَلَتْهُ أُمُّهُ وَهْنًا عَلَىٰ وَهْنٍ وَفِصَالُهُ فِي عَامَيْنِ أَنِ اشْكُرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيْكَ إِلَيَّ الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: And We have enjoined upon man care for his parents. His mother carried him, weakness upon weakness, and his weaning is in two years. Be grateful to Me and to your parents; to Me is the final destination.
verses.transliteration: Wa wassayna al-insaana bi-waalidayhi hamalathu ummuhu wahnan 'ala wahnin wa fisaaluhu fee 'aamayni ani ushkur lee wa li-waalidayka ilayya al-maseer

verses.arabic: تَتَجَافَىٰ جُنُوبُهُمْ عَنِ الْمَضَاجِعِ يَدْعُونَ رَبَّهُمْ خَوْفًا وَطَمَعًا وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
verses.translation: They arise from their beds; they supplicate their Lord in fear and aspiration, and from what We have provided them, they spend.
verses.transliteration: Tatajaafa junoobuhum 'ani al-madaaji'i yad'oona rabbahum khawfan wa tama'an wa mimma razaqnaahum yunfiqoon

verses.arabic: إِنَّ اللَّـهَ وَمَلَائِكَتَهُ يُصَلُّونَ عَلَى النَّبِيِّ ۚ يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا صَلُّوا عَلَيْهِ وَسَلِّمُوا تَسْلِيمًا
verses.translation: Indeed, Allah confers blessing upon the Prophet, and His angels ask Him to do so. O you who have believed, ask Allah to confer blessing upon him and ask Allah to grant him peace.
verses.transliteration: Inna Allaha wa malaa'ikatahu yusalloon 'ala an-nabiyy, ya ayyuha alladheena aamanoo salloo 'alayhi wa sallimoo tasleema

verses.arabic: مَن كَانَ يُرِيدُ الْعِزَّةَ فَلِلَّـهِ الْعِزَّةُ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِلَيْهِ يَصْعَدُ الْكَلِمُ الطَّيِّبُ وَالْعَمَلُ الصَّالِحُ يَرْفَعُهُ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ يَمْكُرُونَ السَّيِّئَاتِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ ۖ وَمَكْرُ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُوَ يَبُورُ
verses.translation: Whoever desires honor - then to Allah belongs all honor. To Him ascends good speech, and righteous work raises it. But they who plot evil deeds will have a severe punishment, and the plotting of those - it will perish.
verses.transliteration: Man kaana yureedu al-'izzata fa-lillahi al-'izzatu jamee'an, ilayhi yas'adu al-kalimu at-tayyibu wal-'amalu as-salihu yarfa'uh, walladheena yamkuroona as-sayyi'aati lahum 'adhaabu shadeed, wa makru ulaa'ika huwa yaboor

verses.arabic: سَلَامٌ قَوْلًا مِّن رَّبٍّ رَّحِيمٍ
verses.translation: Peace, a word from a Merciful Lord.
verses.transliteration: Salaamun qawlan min rabbin raheem

verses.arabic: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا عَلَىٰ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِن رَّحْمَةِ اللَّـهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّـهَ يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْغَفُورُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: Say, 'O My servants who have transgressed against themselves, do not despair of the mercy of Allah. Indeed, Allah forgives all sins. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful.'
verses.transliteration: Qul ya 'ibaadiya alladheena asrafoo 'ala anfusihim la taqnatoo min rahmati Allah, inna Allaha yaghfiru adh-dhunoba jamee'an, innahu huwa al-ghafoor ar-raheem

verses.arabic: فَاطِرُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنْ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا وَمِنَ الْأَنْعَامِ أَزْوَاجًا ۖ يَذْرَؤُكُمْ فِيهِ ۚ لَيْسَ كَمِثْلِهِ شَيْءٌ ۖ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْبَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Creator of the heavens and the earth. He has made for you from yourselves, mates, and among the cattle, mates; He multiplies you thereby. There is nothing like unto Him, and He is the Hearing, the Seeing.
verses.transliteration: Faatiru as-samaawaati wal-ard, ja'ala lakum min anfusikum azwaajan wa mina al-an'aami azwaajan yadhraaukum feehi, laysa kamithlihi shay', wa huwa as-samee'u al-baseer

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاكُم مِّن ذَكَرٍ وَأُنثَىٰ وَجَعَلْنَاكُمْ شُعُوبًا وَقَبَائِلَ لِتَعَارَفُوا ۚ إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِندَ اللَّـهِ أَتْقَاكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّـهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: O mankind, indeed We have created you from male and female and made you peoples and tribes that you may know one another. Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Acquainted.
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha an-naasu inna khalaqnaakum min dhakarin wa unthaa wa ja'alnaakum shu'ooban wa qabaa'ila li-ta'aarafoo, inna akramakum 'inda Allahi atqaakum, inna Allaha 'aleemun khabeer

verses.arabic: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.transliteration: Fa-bi-ayyi aalaa'i rabbikumaa tukadhdhibaan

verses.arabic: مَا أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّـهِ ۗ وَمَن يُؤْمِن بِاللَّـهِ يَهْدِ قَلْبَهُ ۚ وَاللَّـهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah. And whoever believes in Allah - He will guide his heart. And Allah is Knowing of all things.
verses.transliteration: Maa asaaba min museebatin illa bi-idhni Allah, wa man yu'min billahi yahdi qalbah, wa Allahu bikulli shay'in 'aleem

verses.arabic: الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْمَوْتَ وَالْحَيَاةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا ۚ وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْغَفُورُ
verses.translation: Who created death and life to test you as to which of you is best in deed - and He is the Exalted in Might, the Forgiving.
verses.transliteration: Alladhee khalaqa al-mawta wal-hayaata li-yabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu 'amalan, wa huwa al-'azeez al-ghafoor

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: For indeed, with hardship comes ease.
verses.transliteration: Fa-inna ma'a al-'usri yusra

verses.arabic: وَالْعَصْرِ
verses.translation: By time,
verses.transliteration: Wal-'asr

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَفِي خُسْرٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, mankind is in loss,
verses.transliteration: Inna al-insaana lafee khusr

verses.arabic: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
verses.translation: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.
verses.transliteration: Illa alladheena aamanoo wa 'amilu as-saalihaat wa tawaasau bil-haqqi wa tawaasau bis-sabr

verses.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّـهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Say, 'He is Allah, One.
verses.transliteration: Qul huwa Allahu ahad

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: Say, 'I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,
verses.transliteration: Qul a'oodhu bi-rabbi an-naas

verses.arabic: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.transliteration: Fabi-ayyi aalaa-i rabbikuma tukaththibaan

verses.arabic: اللَّـهُ نُورُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ
verses.translation: Allah is the light of the heavens and the earth.
verses.transliteration: Allahu nooru as-samawaati wal-ard

verses.arabic: وَعِندَهُ مَفَاتِحُ الْغَيْبِ لَا يَعْلَمُهَا إِلَّا هُوَ
verses.translation: And with Him are the keys of the unseen; none knows them except Him.
verses.transliteration: Wa 'indahu mafaatihu al-ghaybi laa ya'lamuha illa huw

verses.arabic: تُسَبِّحُ لَهُ السَّمَاوَاتُ السَّبْعُ وَالْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهِنَّ
verses.translation: The seven heavens and the earth and whatever is in them exalt Him.
verses.transliteration: Tusabbihu lahu as-samawaatu as-sab'u wal-ardu wa man feehinn

verses.arabic: اللَّـهُ نَزَّلَ أَحْسَنَ الْحَدِيثِ كِتَابًا مُّتَشَابِهًا مَّثَانِيَ
verses.translation: Allah has sent down the best statement: a consistent Book wherein is reiteration.
verses.transliteration: Allahu nazzala ahsana al-hadeethi kitaaban mutashaabihan mathaaniy

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنَ الْمَاءِ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ حَيٍّ
verses.translation: And We made from water every living thing.
verses.transliteration: Wa ja'alnaa mina al-maa-i kulla shay-in hayy

verses.arabic: وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ الْوَرِيدِ
verses.translation: And We are closer to him than [his] jugular vein.
verses.transliteration: Wa nahnu aqrabu ilayhi min habli al-wareed

verses.arabic: إِنَّ اللَّـهَ وَمَلَائِكَتَهُ يُصَلُّونَ عَلَى النَّبِيِّ
verses.translation: Indeed, Allah confers blessing upon the Prophet, and His angels [ask Him to do so].
verses.transliteration: Inna Allaha wa malaa-ikatahu yusalloona 'ala an-nabiyy

verses.arabic: إِنَّ رَحْمَتَ اللَّـهِ قَرِيبٌ مِّنَ الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, the mercy of Allah is near to the doers of good.
verses.transliteration: Inna rahmata Allahi qareebun mina al-muhsineen

verses.arabic: وَاعْبُدْ رَبَّكَ حَتَّىٰ يَأْتِيَكَ الْيَقِينُ
verses.translation: And worship your Lord until there comes to you the certainty (death).
verses.transliteration: Wa'bud rabbaka hattaa ya'tiyaka al-yaqeen

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَسْتَوِي الْحَسَنَةُ وَلَا السَّيِّئَةُ
verses.translation: And not equal are the good deed and the bad.
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tastawee al-hasanatu wa laa as-sayyi-ah

verses.arabic: وَعِبَادُ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الَّذِينَ يَمْشُونَ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ هَوْنًا
verses.translation: And the servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk upon the earth easily.
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ibaadu ar-rahmaani alladheena yamshoona 'ala al-ardi hawnan

verses.arabic: إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِندَ اللَّـهِ أَتْقَاكُمْ
verses.translation: Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you.
verses.transliteration: Inna akramakum 'inda Allahi atqaakum

verses.arabic: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّـهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
verses.translation: Allah does not charge a soul except [with that within] its capacity.
verses.transliteration: Laa yukallifu Allahu nafsan illa wus'ahaa

verses.arabic: أَلَا بِذِكْرِ اللَّـهِ تَطْمَئِنُّ الْقُلُوبُ
verses.translation: Unquestionably, by the remembrance of Allah hearts are assured.
verses.transliteration: Alaa bi-dhikri Allahi tatma-innu al-quloob

verses.arabic: إِنْ أُرِيدُ إِلَّا الْإِصْلَاحَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ
verses.translation: I only intend reform as much as I am able.
verses.transliteration: In urreedu illa al-islaaha ma astata't

verses.arabic: إِنَّ اللَّـهَ يَأْمُرُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَالْإِحْسَانِ
verses.translation: Indeed, Allah orders justice and good conduct.
verses.transliteration: Inna Allaha ya'muru bil-'adli wal-ihsaan

verses.arabic: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
verses.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.
verses.transliteration: Walladheena jaahadoo feenaa lanahdiyannahum subulana

verses.arabic: إِنَّ اللَّـهَ يَأْمُرُكُمْ أَن تُؤَدُّوا الْأَمَانَاتِ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهَا
verses.translation: Indeed, Allah commands you to render trusts to their owners.
verses.transliteration: Inna Allaha ya'murukum an tu-addoo al-amaanaati ilaa ahlihaa

verses.arabic: وَالْبَاقِيَاتُ الصَّالِحَاتُ خَيْرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابًا
verses.translation: But the enduring good deeds are better to your Lord for reward.
verses.transliteration: Wal-baaqiyaatu as-saalihaatu khayrun 'inda rabbika thawaaban

verses.arabic: رَّبِّ اغْفِرْ وَارْحَمْ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ الرَّاحِمِينَ
verses.translation: My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful.
verses.transliteration: Rabbi ighfir warham wa anta khayru ar-raahimeen

verses.arabic: وَمَا أَصَابَكُم مِّن مُّصِيبَةٍ فَبِمَا كَسَبَتْ أَيْدِيكُمْ
verses.translation: And whatever strikes you of disaster - it is for what your hands have earned.
verses.transliteration: Wa maa asaabakum min museebatin fabimaa kasabat aydeekum

verses.arabic: الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْمَوْتَ وَالْحَيَاةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا
verses.translation: [He] who created death and life to test you [as to] which of you is best in deed.
verses.transliteration: Alladhee khalaqa al-mawta wal-hayaata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu 'amalan

verses.arabic: وَابْتَغِ فِيمَا آتَاكَ اللَّـهُ الدَّارَ الْآخِرَةَ وَلَا تَنسَ نَصِيبَكَ مِنَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: But seek, through that which Allah has given you, the home of the Hereafter; but do not forget your share of the world.
verses.transliteration: Wabtagh feemaa aataaka Allahu ad-daara al-aakhirata wa laa tansa naseebaka mina ad-dunyaa

verses.arabic: وَلْتَنظُرْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ لِغَدٍ
verses.translation: And let a soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow.
verses.transliteration: Waltandhur nafsun maa qaddamat lighad

verses.arabic: فَمِنْهُمْ سَابِقٌ بِالْخَيْرَاتِ بِإِذْنِ اللَّـهِ
verses.translation: And among them is he who is foremost in good deeds by permission of Allah.
verses.transliteration: Faminhum saabiqun bil-khayraati bi-idhni Allah

verses.arabic: وَلَا تُصَعِّرْ خَدَّكَ لِلنَّاسِ وَلَا تَمْشِ فِي الْأَرْضِ مَرَحًا
verses.translation: And do not turn your cheek [in contempt] toward people and do not walk through the earth exultantly.
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tusa''ir khaddaka lin-naasi wa laa tamshi fi al-ardi marahan

verses.arabic: مَا أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّـهِ
verses.translation: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah.
verses.transliteration: Maa asaaba min museebatin illa bi-idhni Allah

verses.arabic: حَسْبِيَ اللَّـهُ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ
verses.translation: Sufficient for me is Allah; there is no deity except Him. On Him I have relied.
verses.transliteration: Hasbiya Allahu laa ilaaha illa huwa 'alayhi tawakkaltu

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اصْبِرُوا وَصَابِرُوا
verses.translation: O you who have believed, persevere and endure.
verses.transliteration: Yaa ayyuha alladheena aamanoo isbiroo wa saabiroo

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ الَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِرَ اللَّـهُ وَجِلَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ
verses.translation: The believers are only those who, when Allah is mentioned, their hearts become fearful.
verses.transliteration: Innama al-mu'minoona alladheena idhaa dhukira Allahu wajilat quloobuhum

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ سَيَجْعَلُ لَهُمُ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ وُدًّا
verses.translation: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - the Most Merciful will appoint for them affection.
verses.transliteration: Inna alladheena aamanoo wa 'amilu as-saalihaati sayaj'alu lahumu ar-rahmaanu wuddan

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ مَعَكُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ
verses.translation: And He is with you wherever you are.
verses.transliteration: Wa huwa ma'akum ayna maa kuntum

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَنْ أَتَى اللَّـهَ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: Except he who comes to Allah with a sound heart.
verses.transliteration: Illa man ataa Allaha bi-qalbin saleem

verses.arabic: مَن قَتَلَ نَفْسًا بِغَيْرِ نَفْسٍ أَوْ فَسَادٍ فِي الْأَرْضِ فَكَأَنَّمَا قَتَلَ النَّاسَ جَمِيعًا
verses.translation: Whoever kills a soul unless for a soul or for corruption [done] in the land - it is as if he had slain mankind entirely.
verses.transliteration: Man qatala nafsan bighayri nafsin aw fasaadin fi al-ardi faka-annamaa qatala an-naasa jamee'an

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَكُم مَّوَدَّةً وَرَحْمَةً
verses.translation: And He placed between you affection and mercy.
verses.transliteration: Wa ja'ala baynakum mawaddatan wa rahmatan

verses.arabic: فَلَا تَعْلَمُ نَفْسٌ مَّا أُخْفِيَ لَهُم مِّن قُرَّةِ أَعْيُنٍ
verses.translation: And no soul knows what has been hidden for them of comfort for eyes.
verses.transliteration: Falaa ta'lamu nafsun maa ukhfiya lahum min qurrati a'yun

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا أَمْرُهُ إِذَا أَرَادَ شَيْئًا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُ كُن فَيَكُونُ
verses.translation: His command is only when He intends a thing that He says to it, 'Be,' and it is.
verses.transliteration: Innamaa amruhu idhaa araada shay-an an yaqoola lahu kun fayakoon

verses.arabic: الْأَخِلَّاءُ يَوْمَئِذٍ بَعْضُهُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّ إِلَّا الْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.translation: Close friends, that Day, will be enemies to each other, except for the righteous.
verses.transliteration: Al-akhillaa-u yawma-idhin ba'duhum liba'din 'aduwwun illa al-muttaqeen

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ قَالُوا رَبُّنَا اللَّـهُ ثُمَّ اسْتَقَامُوا فَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ
verses.translation: Indeed, those who have said, 'Our Lord is Allah' and then remained on a right course - there will be no fear concerning them.
verses.transliteration: Inna alladheena qaaloo rabbuna Allahu thumma istaqaamoo falaa khawfun 'alayhim

verses.arabic: مُّحَمَّدٌ رَّسُولُ اللَّـهِ وَالَّذِينَ مَعَهُ أَشِدَّاءُ عَلَى الْكُفَّارِ رُحَمَاءُ بَيْنَهُمْ
verses.translation: Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah; and those with him are forceful against the disbelievers, merciful among themselves.
verses.transliteration: Muhammadun rasoolu Allahi walladheena ma'ahu ashiddaa-u 'ala al-kuffaari ruhamaa-u baynahum

verses.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ الْجِنَّ وَالْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
verses.translation: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.
verses.transliteration: Wa maa khalaqtu al-jinna wal-insa illa liya'budoon

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا قُضِيَتِ الصَّلَاةُ فَانتَشِرُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَابْتَغُوا مِن فَضْلِ اللَّـهِ
verses.translation: And when the prayer has been concluded, disperse within the land and seek from the bounty of Allah.
verses.transliteration: Fa-idhaa qudiyati as-salaatu fantashiroo fi al-ardi wabtighoo min fadli Allah

verses.arabic: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّـهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُ
verses.translation: And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him.
verses.transliteration: Wa man yatawakkal 'ala Allahi fahuwa hasbuh

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا
verses.translation: Indeed, mankind was created anxious.
verses.transliteration: Inna al-insaana khuliqa haluu'an

verses.arabic: وَيُطْعِمُونَ الطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.translation: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive.
verses.transliteration: Wa yut'imoona at-ta'aama 'alaa hubbihi miskeenan wa yateeman wa aseeran

verses.arabic: يَا أَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
verses.translation: O peaceful soul.
verses.transliteration: Yaa ayyatuha an-nafsu al-mutma-innah

verses.arabic: بَلِ الْإِنسَانُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ بَصِيرَةٌ
verses.translation: But man, against himself, will be a witness.
verses.transliteration: Bal al-insaanu 'alaa nafsihi baseeratan

verses.arabic: نَحْنُ قَدَّرْنَا بَيْنَكُمُ الْمَوْتَ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
verses.translation: We have decreed death among you, and We are not to be outdone.
verses.transliteration: Nahnu qaddarnaa baynakumu al-mawta wa maa nahnu bi-masbooqeen

verses.arabic: يَا دَاوُودُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَاكَ خَلِيفَةً فِي الْأَرْضِ فَاحْكُم بَيْنَ النَّاسِ بِالْحَقِّ
verses.translation: O David, indeed We have made you a successor upon the earth, so judge between the people in truth.
verses.transliteration: Yaa Daawoodu innaa ja'alnaaka khaleefatan fi al-ardi fahkum bayna an-naasi bil-haqq

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ رَبُّكُمُ ادْعُونِي أَسْتَجِبْ لَكُمْ
verses.translation: And your Lord says, 'Call upon Me; I will respond to you.'
verses.transliteration: Wa qaala rabbukumu ud'oonee astajib lakum

verses.arabic: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا مِّنْهُ
verses.translation: And He has subjected to you whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth - all from Him.
verses.transliteration: Wa sakhkhara lakum maa fi as-samawaati wa maa fi al-ardi jamee'an minhu

verses.arabic: فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثٍ بَعْدَهُ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Then in what statement after the Quran will they believe?
verses.transliteration: Fabi-ayyi hadeethin ba'dahu yu'minoon

verses.arabic: وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَاتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَانٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ
verses.translation: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants.
verses.transliteration: Walladheena aamanoo wattaba'at-hum dhurriyyatuhum bi-eemaanin alhaqnaa bihim dhurriyyatahum

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We have certainly made the Quran easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad yassarnaa al-qur'aana lil-dhikri fahal min muddakir

verses.arabic: يَرْفَعِ اللَّـهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنكُمْ وَالَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْعِلْمَ دَرَجَاتٍ
verses.translation: Allah will raise those who have believed among you and those who were given knowledge, by degrees.
verses.transliteration: Yarfa'i Allahu alladheena aamanoo minkum walladheena ootoo al-'ilma darajaat

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لِمَ تَقُولُونَ مَا لَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: O you who have believed, why do you say what you do not do?
verses.transliteration: Yaa ayyuha alladheena aamanoo lima taqooloona maa laa taf'aloon

verses.arabic: وَأَنفِقُوا مِن مَّا رَزَقْنَاكُم مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَ أَحَدَكُمُ الْمَوْتُ
verses.translation: And spend [in the way of Allah] from what We have provided you before death approaches one of you.
verses.transliteration: Wa anfiqoo min maa razaqnaakum min qabli an ya'tiya ahadakumu al-mawt

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ خُلُقٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: And indeed, you are of a great moral character.
verses.transliteration: Wa innaka la'alaa khuluqin 'adheem

verses.arabic: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
verses.translation: And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with [complete] devotion.
verses.transliteration: Wadhkuri isma rabbika wa tabattal ilayhi tabteelaan

verses.arabic: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ
verses.translation: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained.
verses.transliteration: Kullu nafsin bimaa kasabat raheenah

verses.arabic: إِنَّا أَنذَرْنَاكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment.
verses.transliteration: Innaa andharnakum 'adhaaban qareeban

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ وَنَهَى النَّفْسَ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ فَإِنَّ الْجَنَّةَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from [unlawful] inclination, then indeed, Paradise will be [his] refuge.
verses.transliteration: Wa ammaa man khaafa maqaama rabbihi wa nahaa an-nafsa 'ani al-hawaa fa-inna al-jannata hiya al-ma'waa

verses.arabic: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِ
verses.translation: Then let mankind look at his food.
verses.transliteration: Falyanzuri al-insaanu ilaa ta'aamih

verses.arabic: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّـهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds.
verses.transliteration: Wa maa tashaa-oona illaa an yashaa-a Allahu rabbu al-'aalameen

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ الْكَرِيمِ
verses.translation: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous?
verses.transliteration: Yaa ayyuha al-insaanu maa gharraka bi-rabbika al-kareem

verses.arabic: خِتَامُهُ مِسْكٌ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ الْمُتَنَافِسُونَ
verses.translation: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.
verses.transliteration: Khitaamuhu misk wa fee dhaalika falyatanaafasi al-mutanaafisoon

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَاقِيهِ
verses.translation: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.
verses.transliteration: Yaa ayyuha al-insaanu innaka kaadihun ilaa rabbika kadhan famulaqeeh

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ الْغَفُورُ الْوَدُودُ
verses.translation: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate.
verses.transliteration: Wa huwa al-ghafoor al-wadood

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى السَّرَائِرُ
verses.translation: The Day when secrets will be put on trial.
verses.transliteration: Yawma tublaa as-saraar

verses.arabic: وَالْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ
verses.translation: But the Hereafter is better and more enduring.
verses.transliteration: Wal-aakhiratu khayrun wa abqaa

verses.arabic: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاعِمَةٌ
verses.translation: [Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure.
verses.transliteration: Wujoohun yawma-idhin naa'imah

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي كَبَدٍ
verses.translation: We have certainly created man into hardship.
verses.transliteration: Laqad khalaqnaa al-insaana fee kabad

verses.arabic: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّاهَا
verses.translation: He has succeeded who purifies it.
verses.transliteration: Qad aflaha man zakkaaha

verses.arabic: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.
verses.transliteration: Inna sa'yakum lashattaa

verses.arabic: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.
verses.transliteration: Wa lasawfa yu'teeka rabbuka fatardaa

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
verses.transliteration: Fa-inna ma'a al-'usri yusran

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
verses.translation: We have certainly created man in the best of stature.
verses.transliteration: Laqad khalaqnaa al-insaana fee ahsani taqweem

verses.arabic: عَلَّمَ الْإِنسَانَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
verses.translation: Taught man that which he knew not.
verses.transliteration: Allama al-insaana maa lam ya'lam

verses.arabic: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
verses.translation: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.
verses.transliteration: Laylatu al-qadri khayrun min alfi shahr

verses.arabic: وَمَا أُمِرُوا إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا اللَّـهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ الدِّينَ
verses.translation: And they were not commanded except to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion.
verses.transliteration: Wa maa umiroo illaa li-ya'budoo Allaha mukhliseena lahu ad-deen

verses.arabic: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
verses.translation: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it.
verses.transliteration: Faman ya'mal mithqaala dharratin khayran yarah

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لِرَبِّهِ لَكَنُودٌ
verses.translation: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.
verses.transliteration: Inna al-insaana li-rabbihi lakanood

verses.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَازِينُهُ فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ
verses.translation: Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds] - He will be in a pleasant life.
verses.transliteration: Fa-ammaa man thaqulat mawazeenuhu fahuwa fee 'eeshatin raadiyah

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ لَتُسْأَلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure.
verses.transliteration: Thumma latus-alunna yawma-idhin 'ani an-na'eem

verses.arabic: الَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُ
verses.translation: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.
verses.transliteration: Alladhee jama'a maalan wa 'addadah

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ
verses.translation: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?
verses.transliteration: Alam tara kayfa fa'ala rabbuka bi-ashabi al-feel

verses.arabic: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍ
verses.translation: Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe from fear.
verses.transliteration: Alladhee at'amahum min joo'in wa aamanahum min khawf

verses.arabic: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.
verses.transliteration: Wa laa yahuddu 'alaa ta'aami al-miskeen

verses.arabic: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَانْحَرْ
verses.translation: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice [to Him alone].
verses.transliteration: Fasalli li-rabbika wanhar

verses.arabic: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِيَ دِينِ
verses.translation: For you is your religion, and for me is my religion.
verses.transliteration: Lakum deenukum wa liya deen

verses.arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
verses.translation: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.
verses.transliteration: Fasabbih bi-hamdi rabbika wastaghfirhu innahu kaana tawwaaban

verses.arabic: تَبَّتْ يَدَا أَبِي لَهَبٍ وَتَبَّ
verses.translation: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.
verses.transliteration: Tabbat yadaa Abee Lahabin wa tabb

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ
verses.translation: Say, 'I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak.
verses.transliteration: Qul a'oodhu bi-rabbi al-falaq

verses.arabic: الَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَاةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
verses.translation: Who believe in the unseen, establish prayer, and spend out of what We have provided for them.
verses.transliteration: Alladheena yu'minoona bil-ghaybi wa yuqeemoona as-salaata wa mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon

verses.arabic: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُم بِشَيْءٍ مِّنَ الْخَوْفِ وَالْجُوعِ وَنَقْصٍ مِّنَ الْأَمْوَالِ وَالْأَنفُسِ وَالثَّمَرَاتِ
verses.translation: And We will surely test you with something of fear and hunger and a loss of wealth and lives and fruits.
verses.transliteration: Wa lanabluwannakum bishay-in mina al-khawfi wal-joo'i wa naqsin mina al-amwaali wal-anfusi wal-thamaraat

verses.arabic: فَاذْكُرُونِي أَذْكُرْكُمْ وَاشْكُرُوا لِي وَلَا تَكْفُرُونِ
verses.translation: So remember Me; I will remember you. And be grateful to Me and do not deny Me.
verses.transliteration: Fadhkuroonee adhkurkum washkuroo lee wa laa takfuroon

verses.arabic: وَعَسَىٰ أَن تَكْرَهُوا شَيْئًا وَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ وَعَسَىٰ أَن تُحِبُّوا شَيْئًا وَهُوَ شَرٌّ لَّكُمْ
verses.translation: But perhaps you hate a thing and it is good for you; and perhaps you love a thing and it is bad for you.
verses.transliteration: Wa 'asaa an takrahoo shay-an wa huwa khayrun lakum wa 'asaa an tuhibboo shay-an wa huwa sharrun lakum

verses.arabic: قُلِ اللَّـهُمَّ مَالِكَ الْمُلْكِ تُؤْتِي الْمُلْكَ مَن تَشَاءُ وَتَنزِعُ الْمُلْكَ مِمَّن تَشَاءُ
verses.translation: Say, 'O Allah, Owner of Sovereignty, You give sovereignty to whom You will and You take sovereignty away from whom You will.'
verses.transliteration: Quli Allahumma maalika al-mulki tu'ti al-mulka man tashaa-u wa tanzi'u al-mulka mimman tashaa

verses.arabic: فَبِمَا رَحْمَةٍ مِّنَ اللَّـهِ لِنتَ لَهُمْ وَلَوْ كُنتَ فَظًّا غَلِيظَ الْقَلْبِ لَانفَضُّوا مِنْ حَوْلِكَ
verses.translation: So by mercy from Allah, [O Muhammad], you were lenient with them. And if you had been rude [in speech] and harsh in heart, they would have disbanded from about you.
verses.transliteration: Fabimaa rahmatin mina Allahi linta lahum wa law kunta fadhdzhan ghaleedha al-qalbi lanfaddoo min hawlik

verses.arabic: وَاعْبُدُوا اللَّـهَ وَلَا تُشْرِكُوا بِهِ شَيْئًا وَبِالْوَالِدَيْنِ إِحْسَانًا
verses.translation: Worship Allah and associate nothing with Him, and to parents do good.
verses.transliteration: Wa'budoo Allaha wa laa tushrikoo bihi shay-an wa bil-waalidayni ihsaanan

verses.arabic: لَّا خَيْرَ فِي كَثِيرٍ مِّن نَّجْوَاهُمْ إِلَّا مَنْ أَمَرَ بِصَدَقَةٍ أَوْ مَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ إِصْلَاحٍ بَيْنَ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: No good is there in much of their private conversation, except for those who enjoin charity or that which is right or conciliation between people.
verses.transliteration: Laa khayra fee katheerin min najwaahum illaa man amara bi-sadaqatin aw ma'roofin aw islahin bayna an-naas

verses.arabic: وَتَعَاوَنُوا عَلَى الْبِرِّ وَالتَّقْوَىٰ وَلَا تَعَاوَنُوا عَلَى الْإِثْمِ وَالْعُدْوَانِ
verses.translation: And cooperate in righteousness and piety, but do not cooperate in sin and aggression.
verses.transliteration: Wa ta'aawanoo 'ala al-birri wal-taqwaa wa laa ta'aawanoo 'ala al-ithmi wal-'udwaan

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّ صَلَاتِي وَنُسُكِي وَمَحْيَايَ وَمَمَاتِي لِلَّـهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: Say, 'Indeed, my prayer, my rites of sacrifice, my living and my dying are for Allah, Lord of the worlds.'
verses.transliteration: Qul inna salati wa nusuki wa mahyaaya wa mamaeti lillahi rabbi al-'aalameen

verses.arabic: وَلِلَّـهِ الْأَسْمَاءُ الْحُسْنَىٰ فَادْعُوهُ بِهَا
verses.translation: And to Allah belong the best names, so invoke Him by them.
verses.transliteration: Wa lillahi al-asmaau al-husnaa fad'oohu biha

verses.arabic: أَلَا إِنَّ أَوْلِيَاءَ اللَّـهِ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
verses.translation: Unquestionably, [for] the allies of Allah there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve.
verses.transliteration: Alaa inna awliyaa-a Allahi laa khawfun 'alayhim wa laa hum yahzanoon

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَيْأَسُوا مِن رَّوْحِ اللَّـهِ إِنَّهُ لَا يَيْأَسُ مِن رَّوْحِ اللَّـهِ إِلَّا الْقَوْمُ الْكَافِرُونَ
verses.translation: And do not despair of relief from Allah. Indeed, no one despairs of relief from Allah except the disbelieving people.
verses.transliteration: Wa laa tay-asoo min rawhi Allahi innahu laa yay-asu min rawhi Allahi illa al-qawmu al-kafiroon

verses.arabic: لَئِن شَكَرْتُمْ لَأَزِيدَنَّكُمْ وَلَئِن كَفَرْتُمْ إِنَّ عَذَابِي لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: If you are grateful, I will certainly give you more. But if you are ungrateful, indeed, My punishment is severe.
verses.transliteration: La-in shakartum la-azeedannakum wa la-in kafartum inna 'adhaabee lashadeed

verses.arabic: وَقَضَىٰ رَبُّكَ أَلَّا تَعْبُدُوا إِلَّا إِيَّاهُ وَبِالْوَالِدَيْنِ إِحْسَانًا
verses.translation: And your Lord has decreed that you not worship except Him, and to parents, good treatment.
verses.transliteration: Wa qadaa rabbuka allaa ta'budoo illaa iyyaahu wa bil-waalidayni ihsaanan

verses.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَدْخِلْنِي مُدْخَلَ صِدْقٍ وَأَخْرِجْنِي مُخْرَجَ صِدْقٍ
verses.translation: And say: My Lord! Cause me to enter a sound entrance and to exit a sound exit.
verses.transliteration: Wa qul rabbi adkhilnee mudkhala sidqin wa akhrijni mukhraja sidq

verses.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ زِدْنِي عِلْمًا
verses.translation: And say, 'My Lord, increase me in knowledge.'
verses.transliteration: Wa qul rabbi zidni 'ilman

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّهَا لَا تَعْمَى الْأَبْصَارُ وَلَـٰكِن تَعْمَى الْقُلُوبُ الَّتِي فِي الصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: For indeed, it is not eyes that are blinded, but blinded are the hearts which are within the breasts.
verses.transliteration: Fa-innahaa laa ta'maa al-absaaru walaakin ta'maa al-quloobul-latee fi as-sudoor

verses.arabic: وَلْيَعْفُوا وَلْيَصْفَحُوا أَلَا تُحِبُّونَ أَن يَغْفِرَ اللَّـهُ لَكُمْ
verses.translation: But let them pardon and overlook. Would you not like that Allah should forgive you?
verses.transliteration: Walyya'foo walyasfaHoo alaa tuhibboona an yaghfira Allahu lakum

verses.arabic: رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ
verses.translation: Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes.
verses.transliteration: Rabbanaa hab lanaa min azwaajinaa wa dhurriyyaatinaa qurrata a'yun

verses.arabic: رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِي أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَالِدَيَّ
verses.translation: My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents.
verses.transliteration: Rabbi awzi'nee an ashkura ni'mataka allatee an'amta 'alayya wa 'alaa waalidayya

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الصَّلَاةَ تَنْهَىٰ عَنِ الْفَحْشَاءِ وَالْمُنكَرِ وَلَذِكْرُ اللَّـهِ أَكْبَرُ
verses.translation: Indeed, prayer prohibits immorality and wrongdoing, and the remembrance of Allah is greater.
verses.transliteration: Inna as-salaata tanhaa 'ani al-fahshaa-i wal-munkari wa ladhikru Allahi akbar

verses.arabic: لَّقَدْ كَانَ لَكُمْ فِي رَسُولِ اللَّـهِ أُسْوَةٌ حَسَنَةٌ
verses.translation: There has certainly been for you in the Messenger of Allah an excellent pattern.
verses.transliteration: Laqad kaana lakum fee rasooli Allahi uswatun hasanah

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اذْكُرُوا اللَّـهَ ذِكْرًا كَثِيرًا
verses.translation: O you who have believed, remember Allah with much remembrance.
verses.transliteration: Yaa ayyuha alladheena aamanoo udhkuroo Allaha dhikran katheeran

verses.arabic: وَمَا أَنفَقْتُم مِّن شَيْءٍ فَهُوَ يُخْلِفُهُ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ الرَّازِقِينَ
verses.translation: And whatever you spend [in His cause] - He will compensate it; and He is the best of providers.
verses.transliteration: Wa maa anfaqtum min shay-in fahuwa yukhlifuhu wa huwa khayru ar-raaziqeen

verses.arabic: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ الْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.translation: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe.
verses.transliteration: Subhaana rabbika rabbi al-'izzati 'ammaa yasifoon

verses.arabic: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا عَلَىٰ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِن رَّحْمَةِ اللَّـهِ
verses.translation: Say, 'O My servants who have transgressed against themselves, do not despair of the mercy of Allah.'
verses.transliteration: Qul yaa 'ibaadiya alladheena asrafoo 'alaa anfusihim laa taqnatoo min rahmati Allah

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ قَالُوا رَبُّنَا اللَّـهُ ثُمَّ اسْتَقَامُوا تَتَنَزَّلُ عَلَيْهِمُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ
verses.translation: Indeed, those who have said, 'Our Lord is Allah' and then remained on a right course - the angels will descend upon them.
verses.transliteration: Inna alladheena qaaloo rabbunaAllahu thumma istaqaamoo tatanazzalu 'alayhimu al-malaa-ikah

verses.arabic: وَالَّذِينَ اسْتَجَابُوا لِرَبِّهِمْ وَأَقَامُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَأَمْرُهُمْ شُورَىٰ بَيْنَهُمْ
verses.translation: And those who have responded to their lord and established prayer and whose affair is [determined by] consultation among themselves.
verses.transliteration: Walladheena istajaaboo li-rabbihim wa aqaamoo as-salaata wa amruhum shooraa baynahum

verses.arabic: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا الْمَوْتَ إِلَّا الْمَوْتَةَ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: They will not taste death therein except the first death.
verses.transliteration: Laa yadhooqoona feeha al-mawta illa al-mawtata al-oolaa

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِن تَنصُرُوا اللَّـهَ يَنصُرْكُمْ وَيُثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَكُمْ
verses.translation: O you who have believed, if you support Allah, He will support you and plant firmly your feet.
verses.transliteration: Yaa ayyuha alladheena aamanoo in tansuroo Allaha yansurkum wa yuthabbit aqdaamakum

verses.arabic: وَأَن لَّيْسَ لِلْإِنسَانِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: And that there is nothing for man except what he strives for.
verses.transliteration: Wa an laysa lil-insaani illaa maa sa'aa

verses.arabic: هَلْ جَزَاءُ الْإِحْسَانِ إِلَّا الْإِحْسَانُ
verses.translation: Is the reward for good [anything] but good?
verses.transliteration: Hal jazaa-u al-ihsaani illa al-ihsaan

verses.arabic: رَبَّنَا عَلَيْكَ تَوَكَّلْنَا وَإِلَيْكَ أَنَبْنَا وَإِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Our Lord, upon You we have relied, and to You we have returned, and to You is the destination.
verses.transliteration: Rabbanaa 'alayka tawakkalnaa wa ilayka anabnaa wa ilayka al-maseer

verses.arabic: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّـهَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُمْ وَاسْمَعُوا وَأَطِيعُوا وَأَنفِقُوا خَيْرًا لِّأَنفُسِكُمْ
verses.translation: So fear Allah as much as you are able and listen and obey and spend [in the way of Allah]; it is better for your selves.
verses.transliteration: Fattaqoo Allaha ma istata'tum wasma'oo wa atee'oo wa anfiqoo khayran li-anfusikum

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا تُوبُوا إِلَى اللَّـهِ تَوْبَةً نَّصُوحًا
verses.translation: O you who have believed, repent to Allah with sincere repentance.
verses.transliteration: Yaa ayyuha alladheena aamanoo tooboo ilaa Allahi tawbatan nasoohan

verses.arabic: فَقُلْتُ اسْتَغْفِرُوا رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
verses.translation: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.'
verses.transliteration: Faqultu istaghfiroo rabbakum innahu kaana ghaffaaran

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّ الْمَسَاجِدَ لِلَّـهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا مَعَ اللَّـهِ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: And the masjids are for Allah, so do not invoke with Allah anyone.
verses.transliteration: Wa anna al-masaajida lillaahi falaa tad'oo ma'a Allahi ahadan

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ اللَّـهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَاءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.translation: [Saying], 'We feed you only for the countenance of Allah. We wish not from you reward or gratitude.'
verses.transliteration: Innamaa nut'imukum li-wajhi Allahi laa nureedu minkum jazaa-an wa laa shukoran

verses.arabic: ارْجِعِي إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَّرْضِيَّةً
verses.translation: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him].
verses.transliteration: Irji'ee ilaa rabbiki raadiyatan mardiyyah

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَفِي خُسْرٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, mankind is in loss.
verses.transliteration: Inna al-insaana lafee khusr

verses.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
verses.translation: Our Lord, give us good in this world and good in the next world and save us from the punishment of the Fire.
verses.transliteration: Rabbanaa aatinaa fi ad-dunyaa hasanatan wa fi al-aakhirati hasanatan wa qinaa 'adhaab an-naar

verses.arabic: لَّيْسَ الْبِرَّ أَن تُوَلُّوا وُجُوهَكُمْ قِبَلَ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ الْبِرَّ مَنْ آمَنَ بِاللَّـهِ
verses.translation: Righteousness is not that you turn your faces toward the east or the west, but [true] righteousness is [in] one who believes in Allah.
verses.transliteration: Laysa al-birra an tuwalluu wujoohakum qibala al-mashriqi wal-maghribi walakinna al-birra man aamana billaah

verses.arabic: إِنَّ اللَّـهَ يُحِبُّ التَّوَّابِينَ وَيُحِبُّ الْمُتَطَهِّرِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, Allah loves those who are constantly repentant and loves those who purify themselves.
verses.transliteration: Inna Allaha yuhibbu at-tawwaabeena wa yuhibbu al-mutatahhireen

verses.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً
verses.translation: Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us and grant us from Yourself mercy.
verses.transliteration: Rabbanaa laa tuzigh quloobanaa ba'da idh hadaytanaa wa hab lanaa min ladunka rahmah

verses.arabic: الَّذِينَ يُنفِقُونَ فِي السَّرَّاءِ وَالضَّرَّاءِ وَالْكَاظِمِينَ الْغَيْظَ وَالْعَافِينَ عَنِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: Who spend in the cause of Allah during ease and hardship and who restrain anger and who pardon the people.
verses.transliteration: Alladheena yunfiqoona fi as-sarraa-i wad-darraa-i wal-kaadhimeena al-ghaydha wal-'aafeena 'ani an-naas

verses.arabic: وَعَاشِرُوهُنَّ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ فَإِن كَرِهْتُمُوهُنَّ فَعَسَىٰ أَن تَكْرَهُوا شَيْئًا وَيَجْعَلَ اللَّـهُ فِيهِ خَيْرًا كَثِيرًا
verses.translation: And live with them in kindness. For if you dislike them - perhaps you dislike a thing and Allah makes therein much good.
verses.transliteration: Wa 'aashiroohunna bil-ma'roof fa-in karihtumohunna fa-'asaa an takrahoo shay-an wa yaj'ala Allahu feehi khayran katheeran

verses.arabic: كَتَبَ رَبُّكُمْ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ الرَّحْمَةَ
verses.translation: Your Lord has written mercy upon Himself.
verses.transliteration: Kataba rabbukum 'alaa nafsihi ar-rahmah

verses.arabic: رَبَّنَا ظَلَمْنَا أَنفُسَنَا وَإِن لَّمْ تَغْفِرْ لَنَا وَتَرْحَمْنَا لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ الْخَاسِرِينَ
verses.translation: Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves, and if You do not forgive us and have mercy upon us, we will surely be among the losers.
verses.transliteration: Rabbanaa dhalamna anfusanaa wa il-lam taghfir lanaa wa tarhamna lanakoonanna mina al-khasireen

verses.arabic: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّـهُ لَنَا هُوَ مَوْلَانَا وَعَلَى اللَّـهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ الْمُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Say, 'Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us; He is our protector.' And upon Allah let the believers rely.
verses.transliteration: Qul lan yuseebana illa maa kataba Allahu lanaa huwa mawlaanaa wa 'alaa Allahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minoon

verses.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً وَهَيِّئْ لَنَا مِنْ أَمْرِنَا رَشَدًا
verses.translation: Our Lord, grant us from Yourself mercy and prepare for us from our affair right guidance.
verses.transliteration: Rabbanaa aatinaa min ladunka rahmatan wa hayyi' lanaa min amrinaa rashadan
